_comment: Below is the json file which will help create a Gantt chart for Phase 2 of ML Recon.

Jenkins._comment:
- Requirement gathering 
- Install Jenkins 
- Get Jenkins Docker to operate on assigned port

Docker._comment:
- Requirement gathering 
- Install Docker 
- Add all users to use Docker added to docker users group on windows machine

Super_User_Creation._comment:
- Requirement gathering 
- Make super user for Phase 2

Version_control_access_plus_creation_of_._comment: Which version control can we use. Is it possible to use Git or do we only have the option for TFS. TFS does not always support all functionalities we want

Project_management._comment:
Choose a project management tool to be used (Jira/Trello).
 Get access to all members to track progress.

New_client_requirement_gathering._comment: Depending on how many clients are to be taken for consideration, lay down the requirements for new clients
